TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SynchronizedKeyedCollection`2<K, T> extends System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1<!T>
Public MustInherit Class SynchronizedKeyedCollection(Of K, T) Inherits SynchronizedCollection(Of T)
generic <typename K, typename T> public ref class SynchronizedKeyedCollection abstract : System::Collections::Generic::SynchronizedCollection<T>

typeparam.name: K
typeparam.span: 用于对集合所含的项进行分组的键的类型。

span.span: The type of the key used to group the items contained in the collection.

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 线程安全键控集合中所包含的项的类型。

span.span: The type of items contained in the thread-safe, keyed collection.

summary.span: 提供一个线程安全集合，该集合所含对象的类型由一个泛型参数指定，并且集合根据键进行分组。

span.span: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains objects of a type specified by a generic parameter and that are grouped by keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 继承，用于使用宿主。Inherited by for use hosting.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with access synchronized by an explicitly specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用相同 创建 `syncRoot` 的多个实例，则所有实例之间的访问都是受保护的。If multiple instances of the are created using the same `syncRoot`, then access is protected across all instances.

param.name: comparer
param.span: K 类型的 ，用于比较 K 类型的键对象是否相等。

span.span: The of type K used to compare key objects of type K for equality.

summary.span: 使用由显式指定的对象进行同步的访问和以指定方式进行比较的键，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with access synchronized by an explicitly specified object and with keys compared in a specified way.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 `K` 输入参数使用的泛型参数 是此类的第一个泛型参数。The generic parameter `K` used by the input parameter is the first generic parameter for this class. 这样，我们就可以以自定义方式比较键是否相等，例如，用于对比较的大多数关键方面进行优化。This allows us to compare keys for equality in a customized way that can be used, for example, to optimize on the most critical aspects of the comparison.

span.span: is or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `dictionaryCreationThreshold` 设置为 -1 即是将 （2,147,483,647，十六进制 0x7FFFFFFF）赋给它。Setting `dictionaryCreationThreshold` to -1 assigns the (2,147,483,647; hexadecimal 0x7FFFFFFF) to it.
